recurring_themes.evidence: Educational posts average 3x more saves than personal content
Carousels have 2.5x higher save rate than single images
Posts with clear takeaways have 78% higher save rate

missed_opportunities.reasoning: Only 10 Reels posted, but they show strong engagement potential
missed_opportunities.suggestion: Increase Reel frequency to 2-3 per week

missed_opportunities.opportunity: Not posting during peak evening hours
missed_opportunities.reasoning: Only 30% of posts published after 5 PM, missing engaged audience
missed_opportunities.suggestion: Schedule more content for 6-8 PM time slot

missed_opportunities.opportunity: Minimal use of storytelling in educational content
missed_opportunities.reasoning: Educational posts are fact-heavy but lack personal narrative
missed_opportunities.suggestion: Blend personal experience with tutorials for deeper connection

strategic_insights.insight: Your audience craves save-worthy educational content
strategic_insights.action: Double down on tutorial-style carousels with clear frameworks

strategic_insights.insight: Personal content needs stronger connection to value
strategic_insights.action: Frame personal stories around learning moments or actionable insights
